mapper.select: SELECT * FROM biology.excel_tad WHERE Specie LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchParam}, '%') or Cultivar LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchParam}, '%') or Tissue LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchParam}, '%') or Arrowhead LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchParam}, '%') or ClusterTAD LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchParam}, '%') or Cworld LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchParam}, '%') or deDoc LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchParam}, '%') or domaincaller LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchParam}, '%') or HiCExplorer LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchParam}, '%') or HiCseg LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchParam}, '%') or ICFinder LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchParam}, '%') or MSTD LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchParam}, '%') or OnTAD LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchParam}, '%') or rGMAP LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchParam}, '%') or SpectralTAD LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchParam}, '%') or TADLib LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchParam}, '%') or TopDom LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchParam}, '%') limit #{pageNow},#{pageSize};

select * from biology.excel_comparation where Genus LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchParam}, '%') or Tcbf LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchParam}, '%') or JCVI LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchParam}, '%') limit #{pageNow},#{pageSize};

select * from biology.excel_genomics where `Specie` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchParam}, '%') or `Cultivar` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchParam}, '%') or `Chromosomes + Scaffolds (FASTA Files)` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchParam}, '%') or `Predicted Genes (GFF3 Files)` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchParam}, '%') or `Predicted coding sequences (FASTA Files)` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchParam}, '%') or `Predicted protein sequences (FASTA Files)` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchParam}, '%') or `REF` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchParam}, '%') limit #{pageNow},#{pageSize};

select * from biology.excel_hic_matrix where `Specie` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchParam}, '%') or `Cultivar` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchParam}, '%') or `Tissue` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchParam}, '%') or `Matrix (10K HiC-Pro)` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchParam}, '%') or `Bed (10K HiC-Pro)` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchParam}, '%') or `Matrix (40K HiC-Pro)` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchParam}, '%') or `Bed (40K HiC-Pro)` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchParam}, '%') or `Matrix (100K HiC-Pro)` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchParam}, '%') or `Bed (100K HiC-Pro)` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchParam}, '%') or `allValidPairs Files` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchParam}, '%') or `Matrix (.hic format)` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchParam}, '%') limit #{pageNow},#{pageSize};

select * from biology.excel_loop where `Specie` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchParam}, '%') or `Cultivar` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchParam}, '%') or `Tissue` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchParam}, '%') or `Fit-HiC` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchParam}, '%') or `HiCCUPS` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchParam}, '%') or `HiCExplorer` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchParam}, '%') limit #{pageNow},#{pageSize};

select * from biology.excel_compartment where `Specie` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchParam}, '%') or `Cultivar` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchParam}, '%') or `Tissue` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchParam}, '%') or `Cworld (bed format)` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchParam}, '%') limit #{pageNow},#{pageSize};
